score_func.expert_suggestion: Use local_score_BIC as default. Use 'local_score_BIC' for a good balance of fit and complexity for linear data. 'BDeu' for discrete data.

maxP.meaning: Allowed maximum number of parents when searching the graph
maxP.expert_suggestion: Use -1 as default. For graphs with <10 nodes, use -1 (no limit) to explore all possibilities. For 10-25 nodes, limit maxP to 3. For 25-50 nodes, use maxP=5. For >50 nodes, use maxP=7 to reduce computational complexity. Each additional parent can increase runtime exponentially.
